wikipedia_page.main: Wilmot Arthur Turner (1865–1931) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Ardwick and Stoke.

response: McLaren was born in Lochee and played football with the local side before moving south to Royal Arsenal in 1891. He joined Stoke in 1892–93 and played mainly for the reserve side in The Combination. McLaren made one appearance in the Football League which came in a 3–2 defeat at Burnley on 24 September 1892, taking the place of the injured Wilmot Turner.

link_mentions.page: 1890 National League of Baseball of Great Britain
